Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://victoriatx.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingTypeList.aspx)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.victoriatx.gov/234/Boards-Commissions)

   Find out more about the Victoria Sales Tax Development Corporation (VSTDC) that was created in 1996.
3. #### [Public Notices](https://www.victoriatx.gov/678/Public-Notices)

   Find and View Public Notices for the City of Victoria.
4. #### [Water System Review Subcommittee](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1425/Water-System-Review-Subcommittee)
5. #### [City Code](https://library.municode.com/tx/victoria/codes/code_of_ordinances)

   Visit the City Code website.
6. #### [City Council](https://www.victoriatx.gov/501/City-Council)

   Learn more about the City of Victoria City Council.
7. #### [Victoria Community Center Expansion Project](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1339/Victoria-Community-Center-Expansion-Proj)

   On May 3, 2025, Victoria voters approved the creation of a venue tax to help fund the renovation. Design work will take place in 2025.
8. #### [Civil Service and Collective Bargaining](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1431/Civil-Service-and-Collective-Bargaining)
9. #### [Annual Reports](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1328/Annual-Reports)

   Annual Reports for each department in the City of Victoria.
10. #### [Financial Transparency](https://www.victoriatx.gov/339/Financial-Transparency)

    Link to the Financial Transparency page
11. #### [Fiscal Year Annual Budget](https://www.victoriatx.gov/748/Fiscal-Year-Annual-Budget)
12. #### [Master Plans](https://www.victoriatx.gov/750/Master-Plans)

    A master plan sets guidelines for how the City will expand and develop its services and may be specific to a department.
13. #### [2035 Comprehensive Plan](https://www.victoriatx.gov/369/Comprehensive-Plan)

    The Comprehensive Plan is a tool for planning the future of Victoria by addressing the needs of the community for a variety of other topics.
14. #### [Economic Development](https://www.victoriatx.gov/239/Economic-Development)

    The City of Victoria is located at the center of the South Texas Crossroads and serves as the retail, medical, and higher education hub of the region.
15. #### [Employee Portal](https://www.victoriatx.gov/787/City-of-Victoria-Intranet)

    A list of resources for employees of the City of Victoria, Texas
16. #### [Departments](https://www.victoriatx.gov/149/Departments)

    Get information regarding the departments dedicated to keeping the community moving.

* [Newsroom](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1081/Newsroom)

* [Meetings](https://victoriatx.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingTypeList.aspx)

* [Pay a Bill](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1018/Pay)

* [Jobs](https://www.governmentjobs.com/careers/victoriatx/)

* [Report a Concern](https://www.victoriatx.gov/466/Customer-Service-Requests)

* [Alerts](https://www.victoriatx.gov/579/Alerts)

1. [![Victoria Texas Homepage](https://www.victoriatx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=15432)](https://www.victoriatx.gov/)
